instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ko himal parvat haru sansar bhari prasiddha chhan. Prati barsa hajaaron paryatak haru yaha aai rahanchhan.
output: Nepal ko himal prasiddha chhan, ra hajaaron paryatak yaha aauchhan.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Kathmandu sahar ma dharohar haru ko samrakshan avashyak chha. Yasto dharohar haru ko moolya sanskritik ra aaitihasik rup ma mahattopurna chha.
output: Kathmandu ko dharohar ko samrakshan jaruri chha, yo sanskritik ra aaitihasik rup ma mahattopurna chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Pokhara sahar sundar taal haru le ghereko chha. Machhapuchhre himal ko chhaya taal ma dekhna sakinchha.
output: Pokhara taal haru ra Machhapuchhre himal ko sundarta le ghereko chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepali lok geet haru le hamro sanskriti ra parampara ko chhabi prastut garchha. Yasto geet haru deshko moolya ra pahichan ho.
output: Nepali lok geet sanskriti ra pahichan ko chhabi ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Chitwan National Park ma anek prakar ka jangali janawar haru baschhan. Tiger, ganda ra bakhri jasto durlabh janawar haru pani dekhna milchha.
output: Chitwan ma tiger, ganda jasto durlabh janawar haru baschhan.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Lumbini Gautam Buddha ko janmabhumi ho. Yo sthal ma anek aaitihasik avashesh haru dekhna sakinchha.
output: Lumbini Buddha ko janmabhumi ho ra aaitihasik avashesh haru chhan.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ek krishi pradhan desh ho. Yahako adhikansh janasankhya krishi karma ma samlagna chha.
output: Nepal krishi pradhan desh ho, ra adhikansh manchhe krishi ma lageka chhan.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Sagarmatha sansar ko sabai bhanda uncha himal ho. Yo Nepal ko gaurav ko pratik ho.
output: Sagarmatha sansar ko uncha himal ra Nepal ko gaurav ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ma anek jati, bhasa ra dharma haru ko mel chha. Yo desh ekata ko sundar udaharan ho.
output: Nepal jati, bhasa, dharma ko ekata ko desh ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepali kalakar haru le sanskritik kshetra ma mahan yogdan diyechhan. Film, geet, ra nach ma pani mahatwapurna pragati bhayeko chha.
output: Nepali kalakar sanskritik kshetra ma mahatwapurna yogdan dinchhan.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepali khana dal bhat tarkari le prasiddha chha. Yo swadist ra poshan yukta ho.
output: Nepali dal bhat tarkari swadist ra poshan yukta ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Pashupatinath mandir sansar bhari prasiddha haiindu tirtha ho. Yo mandir Kathmandu ma chha.
output: Pashupatinath mandir prasiddha haiindu tirtha Kathmandu ma chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ma chaunri ko kapi lai gundruk banayera khancha. Gundruk Nepali parikar ma ek anivarya dish ho.
output: Gundruk Nepali parikar ma anivarya dish ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Manang ma paryatak haru ko lagi anek adventure karyakram haru milchhan. Trekking ra hiking yaha ko mukhya karyakram ho.
output: Manang ma trekking ra hiking ko adventure karyakram chhan.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepali sanskriti ma lok katha haru le mahatwapurna sthaan rakheko chha. Yo hami nepali haru ko itihas sang sambandhit chha.
output: Nepali sanskriti ma lok katha itihas sang sambandhit chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Janakpur Mithila Sanskriti ko ek mahatwapurna sthal ho. Yaha Ram ra Sita ko katha sang sambandhit dharohar haru chhan.
output: Janakpur Ram-Sita sambandhit Mithila Sanskriti ko sthal ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepali janajati haru ko bibidh parampara ra reetithiti le desh ko rangin chhabi prastut garcha.
output: Nepali janajati ko parampara desh lai rangin banauchha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Hetauda Nepal ko ek udhyogik sahar ho. Yaha anek udyog haru sthapana garieka chhan.
output: Hetauda udhyogik sahar ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Rara taal Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo taal ho. Yo taalamathi chara herna ko lagi prasiddha chha.
output: Rara taal thulo ra chara herna prasiddha ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Bhaktapur ko juju dhau tyo thau ko mishrit mitho dish ho. Yo Nepali mulo sanskriti ko chhabi ho.
output: Bhaktapur ko juju dhau mishrit mitho dish ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ma anek prakriti ko anugrah chha. Himal, pahad, ra tarai le gathit yo desh ma bibidh paryatan ko sambhavana chha. Manchhe haru trekking, rafting, ra jungle safari ko lagi Nepal aauchhan.
output: Nepal ma trekking, rafting, ra jungle safari ko paryatan sambhavana chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepali parikar ma momo ek atyanta lokpriya dish ho. Tarkari, maasu, ra paneer ko momo sabai ko manparne ho. Kathmanduma momo ko thuprai dukan haru dekhna sakinchha.
output: Momo Nepali lokpriya dish ho, Kathmanduma thuprai dukan chhan.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Gorkha Nepal ko purano rajdhani ho. Yo thau ma Prithvi Narayan Shah ko rajmahal chha. Paryatak haru le Gorkha durbar ko drishya ko anand linu sakchhan.
output: Gorkha purano rajdhani ho, jaha Prithvi Narayan Shah ko durbar chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ma Dashain ra Tihar dherai nai mahatwapurna chhuttiharu ma ganninchha. Yo samay ma pariwaar ra sathiharu ekata ko samjhana garchhan.
output: Dashain ra Tihar pariwaar ekata ko chhuttiharu hun.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Karnali pradesh Nepal ko sabai bhanda durgam thau haru ma ek ho. Yaha ko manchhe haru dherai samay samma mul sadak bata banchit thiye. Aba raajmarg le janata haru ko jeevan saral banayeko chha.
output: Karnali durgam chha, aba rajmarg le jeevan saral banayeko chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepali natya kala ma naach, geet ra natak le aaitihasik mahatwa rakheko chha. Priya lok natak haru ko manchayan bhaye jasto, naach haru le nepali parampara ko pradarshan garcha.
output: Nepali natya kala naach ra natak le parampara dekhaunchha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Sagarmatha National Park ma dherai anukritiya haru paainchha. Yaha rare flora ra fauna sangai yak ra snow leopard jasto janawar haru paainchha.
output: Sagarmatha ma yak, snow leopard, ra rare flora fauna chhan.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Janakpur ko mitho mithai haru ko naam sabai le sune ko chha. Lalmohan, malpua, ra rasbari yaha ko prakhyat mithai haru hun. Paryatak haru ko lagi yo pramukh akarshan ho.
output: Janakpur ko lalmohan, malpua, ra rasbari mitho mithai hun.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ma bibidh jati ra bhasa haru ko sammelan dekhna sakinchha. Tamang, Rai, Gurung, ra Sherpa haru ko apno-apno sanskritik pahichan chha.
output: Nepal ma Tamang, Rai, Gurung, ra Sherpa ko sanskritik pahichan chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Kathmandu ko Swayambhunath stupa ek prasiddha bauddha sthaan ho. Yo stupa ma Buddha ko aakarshan chhavi ra shanti ko sandesh diyeko chha.
output: Swayambhunath stupa shanti ko prasiddha bauddha sthaan ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Koshi Nadi Nepal ko sabai bhanda lamo nadi ho. Yo nadi le Nepal ra Bharat lai jalashrot uplabdha garauchha. Prakriti ko sundarta ma pani Koshi nadi le mahatwa rakheko chha.
output: Koshi Nepal ko lamo nadi ho, jalashrot ra sundarta ko mahatwa rakheko chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Bhotekoshi rafting ko lagi prasiddha thau ho. Rafting garda yaha ka tat le ramailo anubhav dinchha. Adventure premiharu ko lagi yo ek suroopma anupam thau ho.
output: Bhotekoshi rafting adventure ko prasiddha thau ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepali sahitya ma kabita, katha ra upanyas le mahatwa rakheko chha. Yo le hami ko sanskritik pahichan ra samajik sandesh lai prastut garcha.
output: Nepali sahitya kabita, katha ra upanyas le sanskritik pahichan dekhaunchha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Patan durbar square ek aaitihasik sthaan ho jaha nepali kala ko udaharan dekhna milchha. Mandir, chautara, ra purano rajmahal le yo thau ko sundarta badaauncha.
output: Patan durbar square kala ra aaitihasik sthaan ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Dhulikhel ek sundar pahadi sahar ho. Yaha bata Himal ko drishya herna ko lagi paryatak haru aauchhan. Clean environment le yaha ko aakarshan badhcha.
output: Dhulikhel Himal drishya ra clean environment ko sundar pahadi sahar ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek garib kishan le jungle ma ek thulo dhunga dekhyo. Dhunga lai utpatang hune bhayeko thaha paayera, usle sochyo ki yo dhunga bechera paisa kamayeko jaala. Tyas karan, usle dhunga uthayera bajaar pugyo, tara kohi bechnu ma ruchi dekhena. Aakhir ma usle yo ek samanya dhunga ho bhanera tyaha faalyo.
output: Garib kishan le thulo dhunga bechna khojyo, tara tyaslai samanya dhunga sochera faalyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek samay, ek budho aama ra unko chhora janmadin manaune tarika ma bech ma aaye. Aama le purano photo album kholi past smritiharu dekhaune bichar garin. Chhorale afno chhoto jeevan ko maya ra sanskriti ko samjhanu parcha bhanera bhaawuk bhayo.
output: Aama chhora janmadin ma past smritiharu samjhin ra sanskriti ko mahattwa samjhin.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ma aakash ra dharti bichko sundar samyojan ho. Himal haru ko uchai ra tarai ko samatal le yo desh lai anupam banayeko chha. Manchhe haru yaha ka prakritik sundarta herna ko lagi manoranthana le aauchhan.
output: Nepal aakash-dharti ko samyojan ra prakritik sundarta ko desh ho.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek jogi le ek samasya ma pareko jivan ko katha sunaye. Jogi le afno sangharsha ra katha bata sabai lai sahayog ko sandesh die. Yo katha le sabailai prerna ra asha diyeko thiyo.
output: Jogi le sangharsha ko katha sunayera prerna ra asha diyeko thiyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek jungli bagh le aafno samrajya ko suraksha garna ko lagi ek din bistarai sabai janawar haru lai sammelan ma bolayo. Bag le sabai ko dhanayabad vyakt garera van ra pahad ko santulan banayera rakhnu parcha bhanera aadesh diye.
output: Bagh le samrajya suraksha ra santulan banai rakhna aadesh diye.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Pokhara sahar ma ek sana katha chha. Ek sana aama le apna bachha haru ko lagi sundar taal herna janekaa thiye. Tyo din ko smriti haru le bachha haru ko jindagi bhar jati ramailo samaya deyeko thiyo.
output: Pokhara ma aama le bachha haru lai taal herna lagera ramailo smriti diyin.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din, ek sipahi afno duty garna Nepal ko ek himal ma base. Tyaha ko tandoor chiso le usko jeevan ma sangharsha dekhaayo. Tara, usle afno sahas ra samarpan ko sabable jeevan ma pragati garna sakyo.
output: Sipahi le himal ko sangharsha ma sahas ra samarpan le pragati garna sikyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek gaun ma ek manche ko manusya pani ko abhav le dukhith thiyo. Usle ek din afno pura village lai nai samriddha banaucha bhanera aawashyak kaam suru garera ek naya aayojana banayo.
output: Ek manche le gaun ko pani ko samasya hal garna aayojana banayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek budha manche ek thulo jungle ma bhule. Tyo jungle ma sabai prakriti le manasik shanti diyaune ko udaharan thiyo. Jungle ma sadhai ko lagi ti budha rahe ra shanti ko sandesh failaune nirnaya gare.
output: Budha jungle ma bhule ra shanti failaune nirnaya gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Kathmandu ma ek naaya school khuliyo jaha sabai prakar ka bachha haru lai barabar sikshya diyinchha. Yo school le adhyayan ko kshetra ma adhunik pravidhiko prayog garna suru gareko chha.
output: Kathmandu ko naaya school sabai lai barabar sikshya dinchha ra pravidhiko prayog garcha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Chitwan ma ek din ek chorale jungle ma bhagna khojyo. Tara, tyaha ko prabandhan ra janawar ko sahayog le usle tyaha ko prakriti ma maya garna suru gareko katha suru bhayo.
output: Chorale jungle ko prakriti ma maya garna sikyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Bhaktapur ma ek narile afno parampara haru bachaucha bhanera dherai karyakram ma bhaag liyin. Parampara ko mahattwako bare ma barambar samasya haru dekhaune kosish gare.
output: Bhaktapur ma narile parampara bachuna karyakram garin.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek kisan le afno bari ko tarakari bechna baajaar pugera dherai becha. Tarakari bechi uthaune paisa le, usle afno pariwaar lai sukha ra samriddha banaucha bhanera sochyo.
output: Kisan le tarakari bechera pariwaar ko sukha ko sapana dekhe.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Tansen ek sundar pahadi sahar ho. Ek din tyaha ek paryatak aayera tyo thau ko pura itihas ra sanskriti ko bare ma dherai kura sikera bidesh ma samjhaune niyam gare.
output: Tansen ma paryatak le itihas ra sanskriti ko bare ma sikyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Lumbini ma Gautam Buddha ko janmabhumi ko bare ma prasiddhi failai rahane karyakram ek abaad raheko sthiti ma cha. Yo sthal ko prasiddhi badhaune kaam lagatar cha.
output: Lumbini ko prasiddhi badhaune karyakram lagatar chha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek gaun ko budho manche le afno purano samay ko katha sunayo. Tyo katha ma unko sangharsha, unko shiksha, ra tyo shiksha bata paayeko anubhav le purai gaun ka manchhe haru prabhabit bhae.
output: Budho manche ko sangharsha ko katha le sabai prabhabit bhae.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek sipahi le aafno purano yuddha ko anubhav sunayo. Usle sathi haru lai yuddha ko kathinai, shanti ko mahatwa, ra ekata le kasto balyo samaj bancha bhanera sikayo.
output: Sipahi le yuddha ko kathinai ra shanti ko mahatwa sikhayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din, ek sanakisan le afno bari ma ek anutha biruwa lageko dekhe. Tyas biruwa bata usle ramro tarika le tarakari utpaadan garera pura gaun lai madad garne yojana suru garayo.
output: Sanakisan le biruwa utpaadan gari gaun lai madad garne sochyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek bideshi le Manang ma ramailo yatra suru gare. Tyaha ko himal, taal, ra local manchhe haru ko sanskritik thulo aakarshan ma pareko anubhav le u usko desh ma yatra ko prachaar garna thalyo.
output: Bideshi le Manang ko himal ra sanskriti ko prachaar garna thalyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek chhoro le afno aama ko ichha pura garna parikshya ma ramro padai gareko katha thiyo. Usle sangharsha ra mehnat le sapana pura garna sakincha bhanera sikhayo.
output: Chhorale aama ko ichha pura garna sangharsha ra mehnat gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Pokhara ko Fewa taal ma ek jodi paryatak haru boating gariraheka thiye. Tyo boating ko samay uniharuko sabai bhanda ramailo yatra ko yaad baneko thiyo.
output: Fewa taal ma jodi ko boating ramailo yaad banayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din, ek chhoro le gaun ko purano mandir ko raksha garna prabhu ko agadi bhandapast garne nirnaya gare. Usko sankalpa le pura gaun ko manchhe haru ma naya aasako sanchar bhayo.
output: Chhorale mandir raksha ko sankalpa gari gaun ma aasako sanchar gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Kathmandu ma ek naye cafe khuliyo. Tyaha, local khaja haru sangai art display haru ko thulo demand thiyo, ra tyo thau creativity ko ek ramro udaaharan baneko thiyo.
output: Kathmandu ma naye cafe local khaja ra creativity ko udaaharan banayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek budho manche le bachha haru sanga afno balyakal ko ramailo katha haru sunthyo. Tyo katha le bachha haru ma purano samay ra sanskritiko bare ma roch garayo.
output: Budho manche ko katha le bachha haru ma sanskritiko roch jagayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Lumbini ma ek jogi le meditation ma baachne tarika ra shanti ko bare ma sikayeko katha thiyo. Tyasle local manchhe haru ma aatma shanti ko sandesh failayo.
output: Jogi le Lumbini ma meditation ra shanti ko sandesh failayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Biratnagar ma ek diwash karyakram ma local manchhe haru le afno culture ko bibhinna roop haru pradarshan gare. Yo karyakram le sabai manchhe haru ma garva jagayo.
output: Biratnagar ko karyakram le culture pradarshan ra garva jagayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Dhulikhel ma ek aama le himal herda herda afno chhora sanga sundar sapana ko kura garin. Tyas sapana le chhora lai nai naya sochnu parcha bhanera prerna diyo.
output: Aama ko sapana ko kura le chhora lai prerna diyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek kisan le afno paddy field ma ek chamkilo pathar dekhe. Usle tyas pathar ko rahasya pataa lagaaune karyakram suru gare.
output: Kisan le field ma chamkilo pathar ko rahasya khojne sochyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Nepal ma paryatan ko bibidh sambhavana cha. Himal trekking, rafting, jungle safari, ra religious tourism haru le deshko arthik sthiti balyo banaucha.
output: Nepal ko trekking, rafting, ra tourism le arthik sthiti balyo banaucha.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek purano gaun ma ek legend thiyo ki ek din Himal ma ek dhanako bhandar khojinecha. Manchhe haru le tyaha nai basera tyas dhan khojne nirnaya gare.
output: Gaun ma Himal ko dhan khojne legend le manchhe haru basera khojna suru gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din, ek guru le afna chela haru lai ekata, daya, ra samarpan ko mahatwa sikayeko thiyo. Yo sikshya le uniharuko samaj sudhaarne baani banayo.
output: Guru le ekata ra daya sikayera samaj sudhaarna prerna diyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Sagarmatha National Park ma ek din paryatak haru le snow leopard dekhe. Tyasle uniharulai prakriti ko mahatwa ra raksha ko bare ma gehrayilo soch garna badhayo.
output: Sagarmatha ma snow leopard dekhda prakriti raksha ko soch badhyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Chitwan ma ek din ek narile gaun ko khel ma hissa liyin. Tyo khel gaun ko parampara ra samuhik jeevan ko sundar udaharan baneko thiyo.
output: Narile Chitwan ma parampara ko khel ma hissa liin.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek chhora le aama lai ek sundar upahar dina parvat chadhne yojana suru garayo. Usle tyo sapana pura garna purai team lai samarthan ma rakhyo.
output: Chhorale aama lai upahar dina parvat chadhne yojana suru gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Janakpur ma ek diwash karyakram le Sita ko sanskriti ko bare ma vibhinna aayaam samjhaune prayash gare. Yo karyakram le sthaniya manchhe haru ma purano sanskriti ko pratiya bhavna jagayo.
output: Janakpur karyakram le Sita ko sanskriti samjhaune prayash gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din, ek saano katha gaun ma ek bideshi bhid antardhyan bhayo. Usle gaun ko manchhe haru sanga nepal ko sanskriti sikhe ra afno deshma sanskritiko prachaar garna samarpit bhayo.
output: Bideshi le gaun ko sanskriti sikhera prachaar garna samarpit bhayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek baaje le afno jagga ko bansuri bajayera dherai lok geet gaye. Tyo geet le pura gaun lai ramailo diyeko ra aafno sanskriti lai sambhaalne prayash bhayo.
output: Baajele bansuri bajayera sanskriti sambhaalne prayash gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Lalitpur ma ek purano ghanti bigrayera bolna sakena. Tyas ghanti ko murti tikaune tippani gareko ek karyakram le purano sanskritiko gaurav hercha garne prayash gareko thiyo.
output: Lalitpur ko purano ghanti tikaune karyakram sanskriti gaurav ka lagi thiyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek shikshak le ek gaun ma afno bachha haru sanga prashasan ko samasya ko barema karyakram gare. Tyo karyakram le samasya ko samadhan ka rasta khojne chahana jagayo.
output: Shikshak le samasya samadhan ko rasta khojne karyakram gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Dhankuta ma ek nepali kavi le ek sahitya manch ma afno kavitaharu prastut gare. Tyo kavitaharu le prem, sanskriti, ra jeevan ko sundarta ko barema prerna diye.
output: Dhankuta ma kavi le prem ra sanskriti ko barema kavitaharu diye.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek kisan le khet ma ek anutha bhari tarakari paayo. Tyo tarakari ko bech bhaye pachi afno pariwarko jeevan sudhaarne sapana dekhe.
output: Kisan le anutha tarakari bechera pariwarko jeevan sudhaarne sochyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Gorkha ma ek purano khandahar ma purana katha ko sandesh khojne prayash gare. Tyo sandesh le samudayik ekata ra sanskritiko mahattwako siksha diye.
output: Gorkha khandahar ko katha le ekata ra sanskriti ko siksha diye.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Sagarmatha ma ek expedition team le ek din barfi himal ma vishram gare. Tyaha ko sundarta ra shanti ko anubhav le sabailai naya urja diye.
output: Expedition team le Sagarmatha ko shanti ra sundarta anubhav gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek purano bato ma ek jogi le bhikhari haru sanga jeevan ko mahatwa ko barema kura gare. Tyasle sabai lai jeevan sudhaarne mahatwako barema anubhav karayo.
output: Jogi le bhikshuk haru lai jeevan sudhaarne mahatwa ko siksha diye.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Pokhara ma ek din samudayik program ma sabai sathiharu sanga taal ko ramailo kura ra dherai sanskriti geet gaye. Yo program le purano mitrata jhagayo.
output: Pokhara program le taal ra geet ko madhyam bata mitrata jhagayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek sikshak le ek purano samudayik gharsanga lagaane tarika ko barema bachha haru sanga karyakram gare. Tyo sikshale uniharulai samaj sewa ko guruthilo siksha diye.
output: Shikshak le samaj sewa ko siksha diye.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Terai ko jungle ma ek raat ko samaya ma ek manchhe le bagh ko shikaar dekhyo. Usle tyo bagh ko raksha garne nirnay gare.
output: Manchhe le Terai ko jungle ma bagh ko raksha garne sochyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Janakpur ma ek samay ek sundar barsha ma sabai sanskritik karyakram gare. Barsha ko sundarta ra samajik ekata ko mahattwa dekhne thiyo.
output: Janakpur barsha ma sanskritik karyakram le ekata dekhayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek guru le afna sabai chela harulai himal ma ekta ra sahas ko mahattwako barema bhasan diye. Tyasle chelaharuma naya prerna jhagayo.
output: Guru le chelaharulai ekta ra sahas ko mahattwa sikhayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Bharatpur ma ek sundar mela lageko thiyo, jaha sabai tarika ka manchhe haru milera sanskritiko sundar udaharan pradarshan gare.
output: Bharatpur ko mela sanskritiko sundar udaharan thiyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek gaun ma ek purano dherai samasya sanga sanghars garne manche thiyo. Tyo manche le samasya ko samadhan khojda pura samudayik ekata banayo.
output: Manche le samasya hal garera samudayik ekata banayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Jiri ma ek sundar taal ko ramailo smritiharule paryatakharulai maya garna seekhayo. Tyo taal le sundar jeevan ko prerna diyo.
output: Jiri taal le paryatakharulai sundar jeevan ko prerna diyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Dharan ma ek din ko samay ma sabai baje haru sammelan garera sanskriti ko karyakram gare. Yo karyakram le purano samaya ko gaurav jagayo.
output: Dharan karyakram le purano samaya ko gaurav jagayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek saano manche le afno chhoto jeevan ma samaj sudhaarne prayash gare. Usle gareko karyale sabai ko jiwanma badalaune prabhav pareko thiyo.
output: Manche le samaj sudhaarne prayash gare ra badal pare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Mustang ma ek pahadi katha sunne afasar ayo, jaha unharu ko sanskriti ra lok geet haru ko katha ko mahatwa samjhiyeko thiyo.
output: Mustang ma katha le sanskriti ra lok geet ko mahatwa samjhaune thiyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek ghumto bato ma ek chhoro ra usko budho bau hidedai thiye. Bau le chhoralai afno samay ko kathaharu sunayera jeevan ko asar ra siksha ko barema bujhayo.
output: Baule chhoralai jeevan ra siksha ko barema sikayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek bidyarthi le ek gaun ma tyo gaun ko sanskriti sikne prayash gare. Tyo siksha le uslai sanskritiko mahatwa bujhna ra bhavishya ma prachaar garna sahayak bhayo.
output: Bidhyarthi le gaun ko sanskriti sikera mahatwa bujhe.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Pokhara ma ek sundar din, paryatak harule taal ko sundarta herda art gallery pani herne thalyo. Tyas gallery le taal ko sundarta ra art ko sambandh dekhayo.
output: Pokhara taal ra art gallery le sundarta ko sambandh dekhayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek baje le ek samuhik karyakram ma purano lok geet bajayera purano samay ra sanskriti ko barema kura gare. Sabai le purano din ko katha anubhav gare.
output: Baje le lok geet bajayera purano samay ko katha anubhav garaune kaam gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Terai ma ek mela lageko thiyo, jaha sabai manche haru le afno afno sanskriti ko pradarshan gare. Tyo mela ekatako sundar udaharan thiyo.
output: Terai mela sanskriti ra ekata ko sundar udaharan thiyo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek chhoro le afno gaun ko purano ghar ko samrakshan garna nirnay gare. Usko prayash le gaun ko sanskriti ko garima hercha garne aasha jagayo.
output: Chhorale purano ghar samrakshan garera sanskritiko garima sambhaale.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek gaun ma ek mahila le sanga sanga basera sabailai padhne karyakram suru gare. Tyo karyakram le samaj sudhaarne ra siksha ko mahatwa bujhayo.
output: Mahilale siksha karyakram suru gari samaj sudhaarne prayash gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Kathmandu ko ek purano dhunge dhara ma manchhe haru bhetera purano samay ko kura garthyo. Tyasle sanskriti ko mahatwa sabailai smaran garayo.
output: Kathmandu dhunge dhara le sanskritiko mahatwa smaran garayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek shikshak le afno purano karyalaya ma ekta, samanta, ra sangharsha ko barema bhasan diye. Tyo bhasan le bidhyarthi harulai jeevan ko kura bujhna madad gare.
output: Shikshak le ekta ra sangharsha ko bhasan diye.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek gaun ma ek saano chhori le sapana ko barema kura garera sabai manchhe harulai unko buddhi ra aasha le prabhavit gare.
output: Chhorile sapana ko kura gari manchhe harulai prabhavit gare.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din, ek samudayik sammelan ma Himal ma jeevan ko kathinai ko barema kura gare. Tyasle sabailai ek apuro jeevan ko yathartha sikayo.
output: Sammelan le Himal ko kathinai ko yathartha sikayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Gorkha ma ek sipahi le afno yuddha ko anubhav ra shanti ko mahatwa ko barema kura gare. Tyasle shanti ra ekatako sandesh failayo.
output: Sipahi le shanti ra ekatako sandesh failayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek jana sipahi le afno pariwar ra gaun ko raksha ko barema mahattwako katha sunayo. Tyas katha le sabailai prerna diyeko thiyo.
output: Sipahile pariwar ra gaun ko raksha ko katha bataya.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek mahila le himal ma taraka herera sundar katha banai. Tyas katha le sundar jeevan ko tasbir sabailai diyeko thiyo.
output: Mahilale himal herera sundar jeevan ko katha banai.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek taalim ma gaun ka kisan harule sanghai ramro utpaadan kasari garnesikdai sanskritiko prabhav ko barema bujhne karyakram suru gare.
output: Kisan harule ramro utpaadan ra sanskriti ko prabhav sikhe.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek din ek yogi le parvat chadera meditation ko mahatwa ko barema kura gare. Tyasle swastha ra shanti ko sandesh failayo.
output: Yogi le meditation le swastha ra shanti failayo bhanera sikhayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek purano ghar ma ek sammelan lagayera purano sanskritiko katha sunayo. Tyo katha le sanskriti ko prabhav ko barema samaj bujhayo.
output: Sammelan le purano sanskritiko katha samaj bujhayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek gaun ma ek sundar taal ko ramailo kura sunaiyo. Tyo taal ko katha le sabailai aakarshit ra anandit banayo.
output: Taal ko katha le sabailai aakarshit ra anandit banayo.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek jogi le taraka ko madhyam bata manavata ra daya ko mahatwa ko sandesh pathaye. Tyo sandesh le sansar ma shanti ko aasha jagayo.
output: Jogi le daya ra shanti ko sandesh pathaye.

instruction: Summarize the following text in Roman Nepali.
input: Ek gaun ma purano mandir ko samrakshan ka lagi ek yojana suru bhayo. Gaun ka sabai manche le saath diyera tyo yojana ko sambhavna dekhaune prayash gare.
output: Gaun le mandir ko samrakshan ka lagi ek yojana suru gare.
